message: I propose we divide the money in an 80:20 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the diminishing value of money with each round.
I think we can do better than 80:20. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still want to keep a majority of the money.
Considering the decrease in the value of money, I propose we divide it in a 72:28 ratio. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the inflation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a 50:50 split. With the money's decreasing value, I think this is a fair compromise.
